entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: SzumisKarp/MusicPlayer: MusicPlayer is a lightweight, desktop-based music player built with Electron. It allows you to play MP3 files stored locally on your computer via a simple, intuitive interface.
entry.content: MusicPlayer is a lightweight, desktop-based music player built with Electron. It allows you to play MP3 files stored locally on your computer via a simple, intuitive interface.

entry.title: lukedawilson/tanagra: A simple, lightweight node.js serialization library supporting ES6 classes (including Maps). Currently serializes to both JSON and Google Protobuf formats.
entry.content: A simple, lightweight node.js serialization library supporting ES6 classes (including Maps). Currently serializes to both JSON and Google Protobuf formats.

entry.title: bukhtyarhaider/HummiGrab: HummGrab is a fast and lightweight YouTube downloader inspired by the speed and efficiency of a hummingbird. It allows users to easily download YouTube videos in various formats and resolutions. Designed for simplicity and performance, HummGrab ensures a smooth and user-friendly experience.
entry.content: HummGrab is a fast and lightweight YouTube downloader inspired by the speed and efficiency of a hummingbird. It allows users to easily download YouTube videos in various formats and resolutions. Designed for simplicity and performance, HummGrab ensures a smooth and user-friendly experience.

entry.title: N454R-4L1/Prayer-Timings: This is a lightweight, responsive web app that displays the next Salah (prayer) time along with upcoming prayer timings for the day. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript the app features a clean, minimalistic design optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.
entry.content: This is a lightweight, responsive web app that displays the next Salah (prayer) time along with upcoming prayer timings for the day. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript the app features a clean, minimalistic design optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.
